name: Skylanders
description:
thsi is the mini games and animations of skylanders

you only need to wait to load it for a time and you only have to press the playbutton and there are no limits. make up your own challange. choose a element and have fun. 

the instuctions are in the gear button where you can chose the language to read the instruction. 

you can also use full screen if you want

YT:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdOJvhjojFe3Z0yKeGEIERA
